name: The Reject Demon: Toko Chapter 0 — Voice Acting DLC
name_original: The Reject Demon: Toko Chapter 0 — Voice Acting DLC
description:
Over 1,500 lines of dialogue, fully voice acted! Add a layer of depth and immersion into your Demon-Kicked-Out-Of-Hell Experience with this Voice Acting DLC.
